mainHeadline.headline: Arbitrage deals search service
mainHeadline.text: Real-time spread monitoring for any amount between m exchanges.
advDescr.links.between.exchanges: The service reads data from the best exchanges and calculates the spread for more than 1500 coins.
advDescr.convenient.filters: With the help of filters, you can set the desired transaction amount, spread, exchanges, commissions and much more.
advDescr.quick.update.spreads: The service monitors exchanges 24/7 and updates spreads every 10 seconds.
advDescr.calc.transaction.amount: The service considers the optimal transaction amount for your deposit, at which the maximum profit is achieved.
advDescr.check.output.networks: The service checks the possibility of depositing and withdrawing coins. It also checks the coincidence of transfer networks on exchanges.
advDescr.commission.accounting: The service calculates the transfer fee and the spot fee, after which it issues a net spread.
advDescr.hedging: Hedging helps to get rid of the risk of price changes when transferring a coin. The service checks and indicates the possibility of hedging such coins.
advDescr.spread.alerts: Notifications allow you to follow the market even when you are not at your computer. We send notifications to the browser and Telegram.
advDescr.coin.transfer.time: The service shows the possible time for transferring a coin between exchanges.
videoBlock.headline: Video
ratesBlock.headline: Rates
infoAboutTgBotsBlock.text: In addition to the browser version, the service provides convenient telegram bots for inter-exchange and intra-exchange arbitration.
earningInfoBlock.headline: Earnings in a rising and falling market
earningInfoBlock.text: Wherever the market goes, up or down, there are always arbitrage situations where you can make money.
